code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductCard=_ref=>{let{product}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white rounded-lg shadow-md overflow-hidden hover:shadow-lg transition-shadow",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"aspect-w-16 aspect-h-9",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.image||'/placeholder-oil.jpg',alt:product.name_english,className:"w-full h-48 object-cover"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center justify-between mb-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-lg font-semibold text-gray-800",children:product.name_english}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/images/plasma-verified.png",alt:"Plasma Verified",className:"h-5 w-5",title:"Plasma Verified"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-sm text-gray-600 mb-2",children:product.name_gujarati}),product.min_price&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-green-600 font-bold text-lg mb-3",children:["Starting from \u20B9",product.min_price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/products/${product.slug}`,className:"w-full bg-green-600 text-white py-2 px-4 rounded hover:bg-green-700 transition-colors inline-block text-center",children:"View Details"})]})]});};export default ProductCard;
